column5: Hey OFC'ers!!  I just wanted to post this quick video of me making a fool of myself yet again, to wish you all a very Merry Christmas and a fish filled New Year. The holiday's are a great time to remember what life is all about - family and friends. Thank you all for being friends and thanks for your support all year long.  Oh ya another thing Christmas is about is gifts lol! So here's what I want. We will have some cool things happening on our You Tube Channel in the next few weeks. but we need as may subscribers as possible to make it happen.  So if you can please subscribe it's free and you will really like what we have coming out there. However I need you guys to subscribe to make this happen.  Once again Merry Christmas and I hope to see you all in the new year.  Here's the link to our YouTube channel. http://www.youtube.com/user/factsoffishing
Merry Christmas to you too Dave.
With a voice like that, you could join the merman tubercular choir  Merry Christmas  PS:  Don't give up your day job.  added

I'm already subscribed Dave, but I hope any one who isn't sure does..  There's lots of facts of Fishing stuff on youtube that doesn't make it to air, and Dave's let me in on some of the new stuff they are gonna do, so Daves channel will definitely have some great new content!  If your not subscribed, lets give Dave a hand here.  Also on another note, thanks to Dave's generosity as well as everyone else who chipped in, we should have a great report on Monday with a total amount for the RESP's for Sonnys kids!!
You have yourself a Merry Christmas too Dave I'm already registered!!! Leechman
One click and I was done, easy peasy!
Merry Christmas, Can't wait to see the new shows in the New Year.
New Years Party!!!!! ???? at your house??? now where did i put my saw zall and sledge hammer?  Merry Xmas to you and yours as well ...  subscribed*
Dave, great to see a host(public figure) not afraid to say Merry Christmas. Wishing you and your family Merry Christmas too.
Well I guess the holiday season is officailly under way. Kids are out of school (and bored) and it's damn cold!  Merry Christmas to you Dave and all the good folks here at OFC.
done and done, 294 and counting  Merry Christmas

I think you provided more than your share of support to our community as well, Dave.  A Merry Christmas to you and yours and to your crew who make your on screen shenanigans possible.  ps. I subscribed a while back.
